entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
